lead_paragraph: KAGAN--Vladimir. We've lost a wonderful friend, mentor, author, and creative genius. All of us at Pointed Leaf Press will miss his warmth, energy, and indomitable spirit. Suzanne Slesin / Publisher; Stafford Cliff, Frederico Farina, Dominick Santise, Michael Steinberg, Kelly Koester 1/3
